content.rendered:
Distilled and bottled by The Macallan Distillers Ltd. Craigellachie.

MMXI Release. 1 of 1,824 bottles. In crystal decanter, with matching stopper within wooden presentation case. Level: high shoulder. 700 ml. Single malt, 48.2% volume
1 bottle
Saleroom notices
Added lot: The Macallan 1824 Limited Release Distilled and bottled by The Macallan Distillers Ltd. Craigellachie. MMXI Release. 1 of 1,824 bottles. In crystal decanter, with matching stopper within wooden presentation case. Level: high shoulder. 700 ml. Single malt, 48.2% volume.
